website_summaries.verdict: Shaker bottle that has plenty of nice features to create your drink, all in a cup that features a fun superhero logo.
pros: Large shaker with capacity up to 28 oz
Includes a metal blender ball that will help you mix the drink more thoroughly
Multiple superhero logos available make this a fun cup to use
Cup's materials are all dishwasher safe
cons: You'll pay a little more for this shaker bottle than one without a fun logo

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like picture!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cup is amazing in person. It looks just like the image and doesn't leak or anything when I use it. I love the colors and should anything happen to my cup I'll definitely it buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Denise R.

customer_reviews.title: Caution: Listen for the snap!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got my bottle yesterday and made me a shake to take to work. I like how the metal shaker came packaged seperately inside the cup. Make sure when you close the top that you hear the snap before you start shaking or you will wind up soaked like i did. My fault not any fault on the makers of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I wanted. I browsed other shaker cup options and for the price of a plain one or one with a brand logo I didn't recognize I figured I might as well spend an extra dollar or two and go for this one. Cute, but completely functional. Lid stays tight while I mix my shake, blender ball gets the powder all mixed in, no annoying powdery chunks. Measure marks, easy to clean. All around lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Georgethegirl

customer_reviews.title: Cool cup with convenient “ring shaped” holder. Easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice looking and it is trendy It is nice to keep drinks you make stay juiced .......the metal ball inside redistributes the different juices etc like a mini blender as they go through a series of different open spaces. At least for me who makes SIMPLE blended juices It keeps the drink cool or warm fairly well I don’t find anything wrong with it and It IS a conversation item 😊. That can be fun Enjoying it. ! I like this series of cups !
customer_reviews.author: Candace Mike N Elmo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this daily since I received it. I mix my beachbody energize in it before my workout and then my hydrate during my workout. I make my shakeology in it after my workout, wash it out and fill it with water and in the evening I mix my recover in it. So it gets A LOT of use. I have experienced no problems with leaks at all and I've dropped it several times and it is still working perfectly. *I've now had this bottle for well over a year and it is still in great shape with no leaks and still gets a lot of daily use. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Book Elf

customer_reviews.title: Not bad...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for pretty cheap($9.99). It seems pretty sturdy. Used it twice so far, and it mixes my whey protein mix with milk pretty well. When I was done drinking my protein drink, I left the BlenderBottle on my front passenger seat. When I came back to my car 8 hours later, the tiny bit of leftover protein drink had seeped out of the top where you drink from. The outside of the bottle was covered in dried up protein drink. Just know this and know that you should leave the BlenderBottle upright when you're not using it to prevent leakage..
customer_reviews.author: Shawn B.

customer_reviews.title: Green Lantern's might
customer_reviews.text: You cant beat the blending action of blender bottle that little spring ball inside works awesome even when I add ice to the mix it still comes out smooth with no chunks. There was also a wide assortment of characters to choose from but I am more of a Green Lantern fan than the others. The coloring on this is great it's not so green that you cant read the markings on the side for exact measurements and the logo has held up through repeated handwashing
customer_reviews.author: Paddy H

customer_reviews.title: SuperGirl!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my super girl blender bottle. I was a bit worried it might not be the same high quality as the other blender bottles but that isn’t the case. It is the exact same high quality blender bottle I know and love. I especially love the little loop on the cap; I use it to clip it on to my gym bag. Very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Good way to get your guy to drink smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I got this to encourage my fiance to drink healthy smoothies and it worked! It's his favorite smoothie cup. It doesn't leak and it has the convenient shaker ball inside to keep the smoothie blended till the end. Bonus: if you ever want to make whipped cream by hand, this cup works great! Just add heavy whipping cream and shake.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: ANOTHER AWESOME PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly. Another great product from blender bottle! As usual this bottle with meet all your mixing needs! It looks even better in person the color is very nice and the batman logo seems like you wont have to worry about it rubbing off. The bottle also sells very tight so you dont have to worry about leakage!
customer_reviews.author: T's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: In Love!
customer_reviews.text: Im in Love! This motivates me to have a quick breakfast before I leave my home when Im rushing to go to work! Ahhhh its so freaking cute! Well packaged nothing much more to say. BPA FREE!
customer_reviews.author: Convcorta

customer_reviews.title: Cute design/color on standard Blender Bottle model
customer_reviews.text: This is identical to my original Blender Bottles, but they have been killing it with designs & colors lately! I have a gorgeous forest green and darker sky blue that I bought in 2019, but I really wanted one of the plum as well. This one seemed pretty close but added bonus of the Wonder Woman logo. It's now my motivational Monday workout shaker!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: The real deal. Great quality, as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I ordered from Amazon rather than buying a Batman shaker bottle from Walmart. Why? This is the BlenderBottle brand! Any other brand of shaker bottle never seems to hold up as well. I'm always very pleased with the quality of these bottles, and this one is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Works great and the logo still looks good after time.
customer_reviews.text: no leaks, logo has lasted for some time with no issues. only issue is with the shaker rod in the middle. small gap between in and the bottom of the container portion so your protein gets stuck there and gloobs up. Add water first then your protein and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Glendis

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: This is a blender bottle, I use it for workout drinks and because its super cute I use it all the time! Thus far have had not issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ms M

customer_reviews.title: Great workout bottle
customer_reviews.text: This mixed my BCAA powder perfectly, with the shaker ball. Wonder Woman emblem still in tack after 6 months. Mouth opening is tight, have to press hard to close and pull hard to open. But, this insures a tight closure and prevents leaks.
customer_reviews.author: SilverQueen

customer_reviews.title: Fun cups
customer_reviews.text: The superman shaker cup was super easy to clean, very durable and totally leak proof. I ordered it for my hubby to take to work for his protein shakes and he absolutely loves them. Would totally recommend anybody looking for a shaker cups.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Anne Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I knew I wanted this the second I saw a coworker with one. Dude. Get this, it's like any other Blender Bottle but it's WONDER WOMAN! The colors are great. I won't put it in the dishwasher for fear the logo will fade. Handwashing it but do what you want. It's awesome, get it.
customer_reviews.author: Lipstick Addict

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking, does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: I like the Batman logo, obviously. The lid snaps closed tightly and hasn't ever leaked. The little carrying handle is nice. My protein does tend to clump though, so the little mixing ball isn't as effective as I'd like. Overall though, I've found it to be a good value.
customer_reviews.author: G_Badger

customer_reviews.title: The Best Blender Bottle I've Purchased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender bottle for my boyfriend as an early Christmas gift as he loves Batman and has been trying to get into the fitness scene. He uses it for everything and it has endured over 2 months worth of washes and falls and it is still in amazing shape. The logo hasn't even worn off yet! I would definitely recommend this particular brand of blender bottle if you plan on using it for all its worth!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love this bottle. It has yet to leak when I shake it up, and it's fairly easy to clean, though with all shakes it's hard to completely get the smell out. Best design!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The bottle seals properly, blends up the contents, and is fairly easy to clean. I'd recommend a thorough run through the dishwasher when you receive it to clear out any taste or smell it may hold. Still going strong months later.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Use Often
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shaker. I use it all the time. The spiral works any powder drink into the water well, and if I want to just go for a walk, I flip up the handle and take it along.
customer_reviews.author: CalJan

customer_reviews.title: Love Blender Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of Blender Bottles. I wanted Batman but that was sold out so I had my daughter pick and she chose Wonder Woman. Works as expected. My old blender bottle's cap cracked after five years. I wish I could have just replaced the cap but I couldn't find a place to just purchase a cap.
customer_reviews.author: russruss

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Leak proof, mixes in my protein powder really well, and it looks really nice. And of course BPA free.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you hear the cap snap when you close it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, really is leak proof. Shake as violently as you want and nothing will happen... but make sure it locks and you hear the click. Made the mistake of not locking it the first time I used it, big mess.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Bottle is fine, but the logo isn't straight
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend bought this bottle to match with mine. But when it came in, the superman logo was printed very crooked, This is her first shaker bottle and she's pretty bothered by the appearance. Bottle itself is fine, but a misaligned logo can bother a person.
customer_reviews.author: James B. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty bottle. It does mix well. It makes me feel like super girl lol. I would recommend it as a nice gift for yourself or any other special lady in your life
customer_reviews.author: trinity

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: For one I love the green lantern logo on it, took we awhile to find the right one. It doesn't leak on me when it's in my bag or on the go, cleaning is so easy and there is no after smell every time I clean it out.
customer_reviews.author: SClin

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget to snap the lid
customer_reviews.text: I brought the Batman shaker bottle recently for protein shakes, and Batman is generally my favorite childhood superhero. For the past month, it's been extremely helpful with workouts. However, the only con is the bottle is a dark, so use great lighting if you're aiming for precise measurements. Also, remember to snap the lid well, or you'll end up with a mess.
customer_reviews.author: pandasaki

customer_reviews.title: Bruce Wayne would use this in the gym
customer_reviews.text: After 4 years of everyday use my blender bottle broke and I needed a new one, what better then to represent the dark knight himself!
customer_reviews.author: gabe

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect blender bottle. Leak proof, good size to carry on the go in the car, to work, or the gym. After many washings, the emblem still very intact and not coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Babineau

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: They are Durable, they look nice and they are a good size.
customer_reviews.author: R & J Olide

customer_reviews.title: Batman Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Only issue with this blender bottle is the fact that its black so you can't see the measurements on the side. Other than that it's a great blender bottle and my husband loves the batman theme!
customer_reviews.author: KB&R

customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Love the colors! Can't wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: A.L.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Very very satisfied with this bottle. Looks great, good quality, and I use it daily!
customer_reviews.author: Milica Lakobrija

customer_reviews.title: Why i smell that bad?
customer_reviews.text: I confuse who blame me or blame that cup smell too bad? still clean is not work all time. Or might cup??????
customer_reviews.author: ELEMENTELITE

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend uses this everyday and says it is easy to clean and reuse
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: The Batman symbol fades fast and the wire mixer is flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Zombae

customer_reviews.title: Double check cover of spout to prevent a mess.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Blenderbottle. The wire blender inside mixes the powder quicker than previous bottles I purchased. It's important to double check the cover of the spout to make sure it's closed before shaking. Or you will have a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I've been using it for quite a while and it's awesome
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Atehortua

customer_reviews.title: My husband
customer_reviews.text: loves it. He uses it everyday. Sturdy and he takes it to work and it doesn't leak all over. Would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love Batman but they always have Batman stuff for men. So when I saw this I had to buy it! Its cute, I use it for all my shakes and it never leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Ma Lu

customer_reviews.title: Love My Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle it keeps my ice intact for a very long time as well as it keeps my shakes or water/ juice at the perfect temperature. I loved the design and cant beat this price anywhere.

customer_reviews.title: great great!
customer_reviews.text: look good, easy to use, clean and shake. very high quality. and yes it is leak proof

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Cute style
customer_reviews.text: I'm a sucker for pink and baby blue together, plus the supergirl logo is a nice touch (even if this isn't her actual color scheme)

customer_reviews.text: Great blender bottle, loved the bright green coloring of The Green Lantern and since its Blender Bottle brand the quality is fantastic.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much your standard bottle with your favorite super hero's ...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special shaker bottle wise. Pretty much your standard bottle with your favorite super hero's logo. My girlfriend loves the shaker, it came pretty fast(probably varies by location) and I'd buy it again for her.

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothies and protein shakes!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cup. Bought for my husband for his protein shakes. He was very happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: Great shaker!

customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my boyfriend. I love Blender Bottles and their ease of use for mixing. They are also easy to clean and I throw all of mine in the dishwasher.

customer_reviews.title: Brightest day; darkest night...

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it!!!

It makes it easy to hang on my pinky finger as I move from machine to machine at the gym while my hands are sweaty. Saw this exact bottle at my gym for $20.

product_meta.title: BlenderBottle Justice League Superhero Classic 28-Ounce Shaker Bottle, Wonder Woman
product_meta.description: Style Name:Classic V1| Color:Wonder WomanEmblazoned with officially-licensed DC Comics logos, authentic BlenderBottle shaker cups get a superhero makeover! Justice League favorites Batman, Superman, Wonder Woman, Flash, Green Lantern, Batgirl, and Supergirl are represented with retro logos on 28-ounce BlenderBottle Classic mixing cups. Shaker bottles include the patented BlenderBall wire whisk that moves inside the bottle as it shakes, mixing even the thickest ingredients with ease (note, may not work on Kryptonite). BlenderBottles feature a secure screw-on lid, carry loop, wide mouth for easy mixing, and embossed markings that measure both ounces and milliliters. Dishwasher safe and BPA- and phthalate-free. BlenderBottle can be used as a mixer, a leak-proof water bottle, or without the lid as a super drinking cup. Alfred-approved, BlenderBottles are perfect for protein bat-shakes, bat-smoothies, bat-pancake batter, scrambled bat-eggs, bat-drinks, bat-dressings and meal replacements prepared in a Flash. Lasso of Truth: exterior measurements only go to 20 oz (but actual capacity is greater).
feature_bullets: Authentic BlenderBottle with officially-licensed DC Comics Batman, Superman, Wonder Woman, Flash, Green Lantern, Batgirl, and Supergirl hero logos
Classic mixing cup capacity is 28 ounces (exterior measurements up to 20 ounces)
Patented mixing system uses 316 surgical-grade stainless steel BlenderBall found only in BlenderBottle brand shaker cups
Perfect for protein shakes, smoothies, pancake batter, and more; use as a mixer, leak-proof bottle, or drinking cup
Dishwasher safe, BPA- and phthalate-free, carry loop top, ergonomic flip cap, secure screw-on lid

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,580 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
